```{r}
library(macleish)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
```

We are doing #5. 


```{r}
# getting the table of maple syrup data and weather data

macleish <- etl("macleish")

str(macleish)
macleish %>%
etl_extract() %>%
etl_transform() %>%
etl_load()

whately <- macleish %>%
tbl("whately")

weather <- data.frame(whately)

weather_time <- data.frame(whately)


maple_sap <- data.frame(maple_sap)
```

```{r}
# Change the when column fron date/month/year/time into date/month/year

weather$when <- format(as.Date(weather$when), "%d / %m /%Y")
```

= => , 
seperate when by the , 

```{r}
# making the maple syrup density graph

sap <- maple_sap %>% 
  filter(!is.na(sap))

when_2013 <- sap %>%
  filter(substr(`2013`, when))

when_2014 <- sap %>%
  filter(substr("2014", when))

when_2015 <- sap %>%
  filter(substr("2015", when))

when_2017 <- sap %>%
  filter(substr("2017", when))

ggplot(sap, aes(x = when, y = sap)) +
  geom_point()


  # geom_area(fill = "darkgoldenrod1") + 
  # geom_line()

```
